description.value: Your studies as a necrovite have progressed, and you've learned how to influence mindless undead. You can use Diplomacy to [[/act make-an-impression]] on mindless undead or [[/act request]] simple tasks of them. If the undead creature is controlled by a creature with a higher level than yours, you typically need a critical success on your Diplomacy skill check.

publication.title: Starfinder Guilt of the Grave World
